title: Project Planning Meeting Notes
content:
## Meeting Agenda

- Project timeline review
- Resource allocation
- Risk assessment
- Next steps

### Key Decisions

1. Move deadline to end of month
2. Assign additional developer
3. Weekly check-ins on Fridays

title: Team Building Activities
content:
Ideas for improving team collaboration and morale:

- Monthly team lunches
- Quarterly off-site events
- Skill-sharing sessions
- Recognition program

Budget: $5000 per quarter

title: React Best Practices Reference
content:
# React Development Guidelines

## Component Structure

- Use functional components with hooks
- Keep components small and focused
- Use TypeScript for type safety

## State Management

- Local state for component-specific data
- Context for shared state
- Redux for complex state logic

## Testing

- Unit tests for all components
- Integration tests for user flows

title: Old Project Documentation
content:
Legacy system documentation from 2022 project. Keeping for reference but no longer actively maintained.

Includes:
- API specifications
- Database schema
- Deployment procedures
- Known issues and workarounds

title: Website Redesign Project
content:
## Objective
Modernize company website with improved UX and mobile responsiveness.

## Timeline
- Design phase: 2 weeks
- Development: 4 weeks  
- Testing: 1 week
- Launch: End of month

## Requirements
- Mobile-first design
- Accessibility compliance
- SEO optimization
- Performance optimization

title: Customer Support Workflow
content:
Standard operating procedure for handling customer inquiries:

1. **Initial Response** (within 2 hours)
   - Acknowledge receipt
   - Gather additional information if needed
   - Set expectations

2. **Investigation** (within 24 hours)
   - Research issue
   - Consult with technical team if needed
   - Document findings

3. **Resolution** (within 48 hours)
   - Provide solution or workaround
   - Follow up to ensure satisfaction
   - Update knowledge base
